actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To provide for the full funding of Federal Pell Grants.
short_title: Pell Grant Full Funding Act of 2001

summary.text: Pell Grant Full Funding Act of 2001 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require that funds be available to the Secretary of Education in each fiscal year in amounts necessary to pay to each student the amount for which such student is eligible under the Pell Grant program.

titles.title: Pell Grant Full Funding Act of 2001
To provide for the full funding of Federal Pell Grants.
